attributes.action: Remove all unfair tax claiming MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it was stupid, they knew full well what they were doing and they used our money to do it. they do not deserve to be in our government if they use all our money for their corrupt needs. it's stealing. they should be removed immediately.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
